person.persName: C. H. Israel (Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, alderman, entrepreneur, and notary public)

body.p: Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, alderman, entrepreneur, and notary public. Alderman of the Fourth Ward of Pittsburgh in 1845. Secretary of the Lucesco Oil Company in Pittsburgh in 1863. Notary public in Pittsburgh in in 1863 and 1865.

bibl.p: "Elections," Pittsburgh Daily Post (Pittsburgh, Pa.), January 8, 1856, p. 2; The Pittsburgh Daily Commercial (Pittsburgh, Pa.), September 16, 1863, p. 1; "Statements of Exchange," The Pittsburgh Daily Commercial (Pittsburgh, Pa.), October 2, 1863, p. 2.
